name: 4 Switch Monitoring
description: A switch that requires up to 4 variables to activate itself.

fields.name: Triggered Local Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that is triggered or set by this actor.

fields.name: Switch Variable 1
fields.description: The first switch variable necessary to activate the actor.

fields.name: Switch Variable 2
fields.description: The second switch variable necessary to activate the actor.

fields.name: Switch Variable 3
fields.description: The third switch variable necessary to activate the actor.

fields.name: Switch Variable 4
fields.description: The fourth switch variable necessary to activate the actor.

fields.name: Switch Settings
fields.description: Controls additional behavior of the switch.

1.name: Remains active
1.description: Switch remains active after being triggered.

5.name: Custom setting
5.description: A custom setting for the switch.
